title: Nearly 25% of Adults With Internet Access in Asia Might Own Crypto, Report Says
contentSnippet: Nearly a quarter of adults might own crypto, but ease of use and access remain limiting factors, the report, produced by CoinDesk and Protocol Theory said.

title: グレースケールのIPO登録書類が公開　トランプ政権下で上場申請続く
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨資産運用企業グレースケールは、IPO登録届出書を米SECに提出。市場が構築されれば株式のトークン化も検討していく意向を示した。

title: Blue Origin Marks First Ocean Landing of New Glenn Booster After Second Attempt
contentSnippet: Blue Origin has landed its New Glenn booster at sea after launching NASA’s ESCAPADE Mars mission.

title: 米国でXRP現物ETF上場、初日取引高は90億円を記録
contentSnippet: カナリー・キャピタルの仮想通貨XRP現物ETFが米国で上場。初日取引高90億円を記録した。2025年に上場したETF中でトップの数字となった。政府機関再開でさらなる承認も期待される。

title: チェコの中銀、試験的にビットコインを購入　ステーブルコインやトークン化預金も保有へ
contentSnippet: チェコの中央銀行は、歴史上初めてデジタル資産を購入したと発表。購入したのは仮想通貨ビットコインで、他にも米ドルステーブルコインとトークン化預金も保有すると説明している。

title: Google DeepMind’s New AI Agent Learns, Adapts and Plays Games Like a Human
contentSnippet: Google DeepMind introduced SIMA 2—a reasoning AI agent built for 3D worlds that the company says is a step closer to AGI.

title: China State-Backed Hackers Used AI To Launch First Massive Cyberattack: Anthropic
contentSnippet: The company said Chinese hackers used its Claude Code system to run agentic cyber intrusions in 30 companies.

title: Epstein Emails Reference Bitcoin Meeting With Brock Pierce at Manhattan Mansion
contentSnippet: Brock Pierce spoke about Bitcoin with Larry Summers at Jeffrey Epstein’s Manhattan townhouse, emails from the financier’s estate indicate.

title: Myriad Moves: Traders Flip on Gold vs Ethereum, Solana Sentiment Sinks
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on gold and ETH racing to $5,000, a new Solana all-time high, and whether the Fed will cut rates again this year.

title: Dogecoin Treasury Firm CleanCore's Stock Hits New Low as DOGE Dives
contentSnippet: CleanCore Solutions has amassed 733 Million Dogecoin, but the firm’s stock is plunging, hitting a new bottom on Thursday.

title: Bitcoin Maxi Jack Dorsey Embraces Stablecoin Payments in Cash App—On Solana
contentSnippet: The payments entrepreneur's app will allow customers to send digital dollars by using "multiple stablecoins and networks."

title: Solana Slides 5% to $145 as Technical Breakdown Overshadows ETF Momentum
contentSnippet: The token fell through key support despite elevated trading volume and continued institutional inflows into spot ETFs.

title: Bitcoin Miners Lead Crypto Stock Losses Amid Wider Market Dip—With BTC Falling
contentSnippet: Bitcoin miners and other crypto-focused stocks plummeted on Thursday amid a wider downturn in crypto markets and other risk-on assets.

title: Czech Republic Invests in Crypto, With Eye on Eventual Bitcoin Reserve
contentSnippet: The nation’s central bank has unveiled a pilot investment in Bitcoin, stablecoins, and tokenized deposits to better understand how to adopt digital assets.

title: This One Weird Trick Defeats AI Safety Features in 99% of Cases
contentSnippet: New research shows that AI's extended reasoning creates a security vulnerability, with extremely high attack success rates across major models including GPT, Claude, and Gemini.

title: Strategy Plunges to Weakest in 13 Months, but Still Trades at Premium to Bitcoin Holdings
contentSnippet: Alongside bitcoin's tumble back to $98,000, MSTR is lower by another 6.6% on Thursday, bringing its year-to-date decline to 30%.

title: Retail Mood Sours Amid Crypto Selloff, Flashing Short-Term Bottom Signals for BTC, ETH, XRP
contentSnippet: A fresh wave of pessimism is sweeping across crypto markets, but the mood shift may be doing more good than harm.

title: Chainlink Breaks Below $14.50 Amid Broader Selloff; Reserve Adds 74K LINK Despite Losses
contentSnippet: Technical breakdown occurred despite positive institutional developments as volume surged during selloff

title: Stellar Tumbles Below Key $0.285 Support as Bears Take Over
contentSnippet: XLM retreated to $0.281 as selling pressure intensified during afternoon trading, with volume surging amid failed resistance test.

title: Bitcoin Crumbles Below $100K, Crypto Stocks Eviscerated as Liquidity Crunch Hammers Risk Markets
contentSnippet: Crypto’s U.S. trading-hour weakness continues as hopes for a new 2025 BTC high fade, a market strategist said.

title: HBAR Drops 3.5% Breaking Support as ETF Inflows Hit $68 Million
contentSnippet: Hedera's native token retreats from $0.1817 to $0.1754 despite institutional accumulation.

title: ICP Advances as Consolidation Holds Below $6.66 Resistance Price
contentSnippet: Internet Computer trades within a narrow range after an early-volume breakout attempt stalled, keeping the token pinned between key support at $6.05 and $6.66.

title: Solana-Focused Upexi Approves $50M Share Buyback as Digital Asset Treasuries Turn to Repurchases
contentSnippet: The Solana-centric company is joining a growing list of crypto treasury companies opting to buy back shares as investor appetite for DATs vane.

title: 台湾中銀、ビットコインの国家準備資産化の「研究」へ
contentSnippet: 台湾の立法委員がビットコインを国家準備資産に組み入れる提案を行い、中央銀行が研究姿勢を示した。米国やブータンなど各国で進むビットコイン戦略的保有の動向と、エルサルバドルの事例から見る課題を解説。

title: メタプラネット、第3四半期決算でビットコイン評価益206億円を計上
contentSnippet: メタプラネットの2025年12月期第3四半期決算発表。BTC保有量30,823枚に到達し目標前倒し達成、インカム事業過去最高売上。純利益135億円計上、1億ドル借入で追加取得へ。優先株活用の新戦略で普通株希薄化回避、2027年21万BTC目標を掲げる。

title: ステーブルコインUSDCの運用法｜Aaveで年4％前後を狙う始め方
contentSnippet: USDCを預けるだけで利息が得られるAaveの仕組みと利回り、始め方を初心者向けに解説。利用率による金利変動やリスク、SBI VCトレードでのUSDC準備まで網羅します。

title: CMEグループとFanDuel、仮想通貨や株価指数などの予測市場アプリを12月に開始
contentSnippet: FanDuelとCMEグループが12月に予測市場プラットフォーム「FanDuel Predicts」を開始。株価指数、仮想通貨、商品などのイベント契約取引が可能に。2035年に14兆円規模へ成長が予測される予測市場に、ロビンフッドやドラフトキングスなど大手企業も参入。

title: レンジ相場続くビットコイン、10万ドルが防衛線に＝Glassnode分析
contentSnippet: Glassnodeの最新分析によると、ビットコインは9.7万〜11.2万ドルのレンジ相場が継続している。10万ドルが重要な心理的防衛ラインとなっており、これを下回ると急落リスクが高まる可能性がある。

title: イーサリアム上のトークン化資産が30兆円突破　他のチェーン合計を上回る
contentSnippet: イーサリアム上のトークン化資産が2010億ドル（約30兆円）を突破し、全ブロックチェーンの3分の2を占める。ステーブルコイン27兆円、機関投資家向けファンド、RWA1.8兆円と多様なエコシステムが拡大中。

title: Visa、ステーブルコイン決済の試験運用を開始　クリエイターやギグワーカー向け
contentSnippet: Visaが米ドル連動型ステーブルコインUSDCを活用した決済サービスの試験運用を開始。クリエイターやギグワーカーに数分以内の即時入金を提供し、国境を越えた決済を迅速化。2026年後半に本格展開予定。
